#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,i,j,n,b;
	string l,s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>l>>s;
		j=l.length();
		for(i=0,b=0;i<j;i++){
			if(l[i]==s[b]){
				b++;
			}
		}
		if(b==j-1) cout<<"1\n";
		else cout<<"0\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
